figure.figDesc: the mutant form S188A of chloroplast A 4 -GAPDH complexed with NADP, have been collected to 2.1 Å of resolution. The crystals dimensions were about 0.3×0.3×0.1 and the diffraction spot shape was nice. Three data collection were made and the data were merged togheter.
